Package A4_Flights

Class Flight

java.lang.Object
A4_Flights.Flight
Direct Known Subclasses:
CargoFlight, PassengerFlight, TrainingFlight
public abstract class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
A nonstop flight departing from the home airport.

  • Constructor Details

    • Flight

      public Flight​(java.lang.String flightNumber, java.lang.String dayOfWeek, int departureTime, Location destination, int numCrew)
      Creates a flight with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - the flight identifier
      dayOfWeek - a three-letter string, one of {Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat}
      departureTime - an integer from 0 to 2359
      destination - the location of this flight's destination
      numCrew - the number of crew members

  • Method Details

    • calculateWeight

      public int calculateWeight()
      Calculates the weight of this flight as the weight of the crew members.
      Returns:
      the weight
